summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an additional partially reimbursable appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund for the improvement of 33rd Ave. S. from approximately 280 feet North of S. Graham St. to approximately 260 feet north of S. Raymone St.; and certain other streets, avenues and an alley; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same under Local Improvement District No. 6695; and authorizing the hiring of consultants therefor.
